page.title: 15OLD AGE PENSIONERS.
page.content: Old age pensioners usually retire between the ages of 60 and 65.when you are a pensioner you get paid a certain amount of money by the government. When people are over the age of working they should be allowed to take it easy.You are paid different amounts of money depending on the job you did and if you are married.Often people get paid extra money by the company they worked for. We have found that there are more grandmothers than grandfathers of children in the First Year.This may be because of the Second World War or perhaps ladies live longer than men. The council build special homes for pensioners.
